amendment.description: To require a CBO report on any new debt created by a budget resolution upon the reporting of that budget resolution.

vote.text: Amendment SA 839 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 839 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S7114; text: CR S7114) To require a CBO report on any new debt created by a budget resolution upon the reporting of that budget resolution.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 839 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 839 proposed by Senator Durbin.
